review: Loved it! Very awesome game, especially for those of you who are completionists. You can either carry on with the story line, or head back to grab everything to get better items. Very worthwhile game - especially since it's free! Highly recommended for anyone who loves games like final fantasy, legend of dragoon etc. Very simplified versions of those games - but the developer did an amazing job!
I was absolutely amazed with how well this game was put together. Definitely worth a buy!
